template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Alguien tiene una pregunta acerca de tu anuncio
template.s_description:
¡Hola {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) te ha dejado un mensaje acerca de tu anuncio {ITEM_TITLE}:

{COMMENT}

Saludos,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: Por favor, valida tu cuenta en {WEB_TITLE}
template.s_description:
Hola {USER_NAME},

Por favor, valida tu registro haciendo clic en el siguiente enlace: {VALIDATION_LINK}

¡Gracias!

Saludos,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You've successfully registered for {WEB_LINK}.

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hola {FRIEND_NAME},

Tu amigo {USER_NAME} quiere compartir este anuncio contigo {ITEM_TITLE}.

Mensaje:

{COMMENT}

Saludos,

{WEB_TITLE}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nuevos anuncios in the last hour
template.s_description:
Hola {USER_NAME},

Se han publicado nuevos anuncios en la última hora. Échales un vistazo:

{ADS}

-------------

Para dejar de recibir esta alerta, haz clic en: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nuevos anuncios in the last day
template.s_description:
Hola {USER_NAME},

Se han publicados anuncios nuevos durante el día de hoy. Échales un vistazo:

{ADS}

-------------

Para dejar de recibir esta alerta, haz clic en: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Nuevos anuncios in the last week
template.s_description:
Hola {USER_NAME},

Se han publicado nuevos anuncios en la última semana. Échales un vistazo:

{ADS}

-------------

Para dejar de recibir esta alerta, haz clic en: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Hola {USER_NAME},

Se ha publicado un nuevo anuncio, ¡échale un vistazo!

{ADS}

-------------

Para dejar de recibir esta alerta, haz clic en: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

Someone commented on the listing {ITEM_TITLE}.

Commenter: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Commenter's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, but you can still edit or delete the listing {ITEM_TITLE} for a short period of time.

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

If you register as a user, you will have full access to editing options.

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this email.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Se ha publicado un anuncio nuevo
template.s_description:
Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact email: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

You can edit this listing by clicking on the following link: {EDIT_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

We've sent you this e-mail because you've requested a password reminder. Follow this link to recover it: {PASSWORD_LINK}

The link will be deactivated in 24 hours.

If you didn't request a password reminder, please ignore this message. This request was made from IP {IP_ADDRESS} on {DATE_TIME}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Has solicitado un cambio de correo electrónico
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME}

You're receiving this e-mail because you requested an e-mail change. Please confirm this new e-mail address by clicking on the following validation link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

Hola {USER_NAME},

Por favor, valida tu registro de alerta. Haz clic en el siguiente enlace: {VALIDATION_LINK}

¡Gracias!

Saludos,

{WEB_LINK}

Hola {COMMENT_AUTHOR},

Tu comentario en {ITEM_TITLE} ha sido aprobado.

Saludos,

{WEB_LINK}

Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because you’ve published a listing at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this e-mail.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Even if you're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, you can still edit or delete your listing:

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Se ha registrado un nuevo usuario
template.s_description:
Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a new user has been created at {WEB_LINK}.

User details:

Name: {USER_NAME}
E-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Alguien tiene una pregunta para ti
template.s_description:
Hola {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) te ha dejado un mensaje:

{COMMENT}

Saludos,

{WEB_LINK}

There's a new comment on the listing: {ITEM_TITLE}.

Author: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Author's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

{WEB_LINK}

Hola {ADMIN_NAME},

El administrador de {WEB_LINK} ha creado una cuenta para ti,

  • Nombre de usuario: {USERNAME}
  • Contraseña: {PASSWORD}

Puedes acceder al panel de administración aquí {WEB_ADMIN_LINK}.

¡Gracias!

Saludos,

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - Tu anuncio está a punto de caducar
template.s_description:
Hola {USER_NAME},

Tu anuncio {ITEM_TITLE} está a punto de caducar en {WEB_LINK}.
